name: Block executables run from a network drive
Block executions from banned removable devices
Block executions from unapproved removable devices
Block writes to banned removable devices
Block writes to unapproved removable devices
Block files with banned publishers or certificates
Terminate processes with banned images
description: Terminates any process that already has a loaded banned image loaded when the agent was not enforcing

name: Report processes with banned images
description: Reports processes that would be terminated if Active Banning was enabled

name: Autostart Rules
description: Generate an event whenever a registry autostart location is modified

name: [Sample] Report Changes to Home Page or Search Settings
pathPattern: |*\software\microsoft\internet explorer\main\Default_Page_URL|*\software\microsoft\internet explorer\main\Default_Search_URL|*\software\microsoft\internet explorer\main\start page|*\software\microsoft\internet explorer\main\search page|*\software\microsoft\internet explorer\main\search bar|*\software\microsoft\internet explorer\search\searchassistant|*\software\microsoft\internet explorer\search\customizesearch|*\software\microsoft\internet explorer\searchscopes\*|*\software\microsoft\internet explorer\searchurl\*|*\software\microsoft\internet explorer\urlsearchhooks\*
description: Generate an event whenever the home page or the search settings for Internet Explorer are modified

name: [Sample] Report Changes to Trusted Zones
description: Generate an event whenever a change is made to the sites or IP addresses in the Internet Explorer Trusted Zone

name: [Sample] Report Typical Changes to Startup Files
description: Generate an event whenever a registry change is made to launch a file during system startup

name: [Sample] Prompt on Suspicious changes to Startup Files
description: Prompt whenever an unusual registry change is made to alter the startup or system files

name: [Sample] Block Suspicious System Changes
description: Block changes to the registry that are considered highly suspicious

name: Case Sensitivity: Block Registry Modifications
description: Block changes to the registry that allow case sensitive directories

name: Carbon Black EDR Sensor Optimization
description: Performance optimization for Carbon Black sensor

name: [Sample] Ignore Puppet master and agent
description: Ignore Puppet master and agent

name: [Sample] Ignore Chef server and agent repo
description: Ignore Chef server and agent repo

name: Ignore Carbon Black EDR Linux Sensor
description: Ignore directory used by Carbon Black sensor

name: Ignore Carbon Black EDR Osx Sensor
description: Ignore directory used by Carbon Black sensor

name: [Sample] Do not report csc.exe temporary files
description: Don't report temporary files created by csc.exe

name: [Sample] Block loading of NTVDM.exe
description: Block NTVDM.exe to prevent execution of 16 Bit Applications.

name: Ignore Carbon Black EDR Server
description: Ignore directory used by Carbon Black server

name: Ignore Recycle Bin
description: Recycle Bin temporary files

name: Ignore Recycle Bin
description: Recycle Bin temporary files

name: Ignore Linux virtual file systems
description: Ignore Linux virtual file systems

name: Ignore Data Files
description: Common data files

name: Ignore Outlook Files
description: Microsoft Outlook data files

name: Ignore System Files
description: Frequently written system files

name: Ignore System Restore
description: System restore files

name: Ignore Recycle Bin
description: Recycle Bin temporary files

name: Allow .NET dll executions
description: Name-based rule to allow .NET to execute the dll's it compiles

name: [Sample] TortoiseSVN
description: Sample name-based rule to ignore files updated by the primary TortoiseSVN process

name: [Sample] VMware Workstation
description: Sample name-based rule to ignore files used by VMware Workstation

name: [Sample] Visual Studio - Approve Builds
description: A name-based rule using registry macros to identify and promote Microsoft Visual Studio 2008-2013 based on the registered handlers for each solution.

name: [Sample] Visual Studio - Ignore Intermediate Files
description: Sample to ignore intermediate files typical of many build environments when created by promoted processes

name: [Sample] Microsoft App-V Interoperability
description: Allow execution and ignore modifications on Microsoft App-V storage volumes.

name: Track system profile
description: Track modifications to the system profile

name: Ignore Linux Log Files
description: Linux log files

name: Time Machine
description: Time Machine

name: Mac User Data Files
description: Mac User Data Files

name: Mac User Cache App Files
description: Track Mac User Cache App Files

name: Mac Spotlight
description: Mac Spotlight

name: Microsoft Office for Mac
processPattern: |*/Contents/MacOS/Microsoft Database Utility|*/Contents/MacOS/Microsoft Database Daemon|*/Contents/MacOS/Microsoft Lync|*/Contents/MacOS/Microsoft Outlook
description: Microsoft Office for Mac

name: [Sample] Xcode Promote
description: Sample name-based rule to promote Xcode

name: [Sample] Xcode - Ignore Intermediate Files
description: Sample to ignore intermediate files typical of many Xcode build environments when created by promoted processes

name: MDS
description: MDS

name: MDWorker
description: MDWorker

name: SUHelperD
description: SUHelperD

name: Ignore Bootcamp Volume
description: Avoid initializing bootcamp partitions

name: Ignore Time Machine Volume
description: Avoid initializing bootcamp partitions

name: Ignore Finder Archive Temp
description: Ignore temp files used by Finder archive

name: Ignore Installer Trash Cleanup
description: Ignore throw-away files from the installer service

name: Deny read-only memory map operations on banned executables by .NET applications
description: Deny read-only memory map operations on banned files by .NET applications

name: [Sample] Deny read-only memory map operations on unapproved executables by .NET applications in high enforcement
description: Deny read-only memory map operations on unapproved files by .NET applications in high enforcement

name: [Sample] Prompt for read-only memory map operations on unapproved executables by .NET applications in medium enforcement
description: Prompt read-only memory map operations on unapproved files by .NET applications in medium enforcement

name: Report read-only memory map operations on unapproved executables by .NET applications
description: Report read-only memory map operations on unapproved files by .NET applications

name: Do not treat these processes as .NET applications
description: Do not treat these processes as .NET applications

name: [Sample] Report whenever powershell is launched with encoded arguments
description: Report an event when someone tries to run powershell with an encoded script.  This will only work on version 8.0 agents since the <Cmdline> macro does not exist on earlier versions

name: Block powershell scripts that execute memory
description: Prevents the execution of any PowerShell script that contains a reference to Microsoft's VirtualProtect API

name: Examine powershell script contents
description: YARA Classify powershell scripts

name: Block execution of malicious files identified by yara
description: Prevents the execution of any file deemed malicious via yara rules

name: Report execution of potential risk files identified by yara
description: Report the execution of any file deemed as a potential risk via yara rules

name: Ignore system log files
description: Microsoft system log files

name: Tag process as msiexec identified by yara
description: Tag process as msi via yara tag
